source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH ContractEventLinks AS 
(
	SELECT 
		ContractID
		,EventTypeID
		,EventDateTime 
	FROM [Evolution].[Crm].[ContractEventLink]  
	WHERE EventTypeID IN (3, 4)
)
,ContractCosts AS
(
	SELECT
		ContractProductID
		,CostTypeID
		,Amount
		,AffectsHardwareFund
		,RecurrenceCount
	FROM [Evolution].[Crm].[ContractCost] 
	WHERE RemovedDate IS NULL AND (CostTypeID IN (8, 2, 9, 34, 35, 36, 37, 38, 39) OR AffectsHardwareFund = 1)
)
,SBIDates AS
(
	SELECT
		USI
		,MPN
		,rp.AccountNumber
		,MAX(p.PeriodDate) SBIDate
	FROM [Evolution].[SBI].[Period] p 
	INNER JOIN [Evolution].[SBI].[FileGroup] fg  ON p.PeriodID = fg.PeriodID
	INNER JOIN [Evolution].[SBI].[File] f  ON fg.FileGroupID = f.FileGroupID
	INNER JOIN [Evolution].[SBI].[Summary] s  ON s.FileID = f.FileID
	INNER JOIN [Evolution].[SBI].[RevsharePayment] rp  ON rp.SummaryID = s.SummaryID
	GROUP BY USI, MPN, rp.AccountNumber
)
,Tariffs AS
(
	SELECT
		cp.ContractID
		,cp.ContractProductID
		,pr.ProductID
		,pr.[Name] AS ProductName
		,gr.[Name] AS ProductGroup
		,tt.Term
		,dp.RevsharePct
		,dp.UpgradeTariff
		,ta.Legacy
		,pt.Name ProductType
	FROM [Evolution].[Crm].[ContractProduct] cp 
	INNER JOIN [Evolution].[Product].[DistributorProduct] dp  ON dp.DistributorProductID = cp.DistributorProductID
	INNER JOIN [Evolution].[Product].[Product] pr  ON pr.ProductID = dp.ProductID
	left join [Evolution].crm.TariffTerm tt on tt.TariffTermID = pr.TariffTermID
	INNER JOIN [Evolution].[Product].[Group] gr  ON gr.GroupID = pr.GroupID 
												AND gr.ProductTypeID = 1
	left join [Evolution].Product.Type pt on pt.TypeID = gr.ProductTypeID

	LEFT JOIN --get the most recent version of tariff(?)
	(
		SELECT
		TariffCode, PackageCode, Legacy, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY TariffCode, PackageCode ORDER BY TariffID DESC) AS RowNum
		FROM Evolution.EService.Tariff 
		WHERE [Version] = (SELECT TOP 1 [Version] FROM Evolution.EService.Tariff  WHERE [Version] IS NOT NULL ORDER BY 1 DESC)
	) ta ON ta.TariffCode = dp.TariffCode AND ta.PackageCode = dp.PackageCode AND ta.RowNum = 1
	WHERE cp.RemovedDate IS NULL
)
,Funding as(
select 
	ContractID
	,cp.AddedDate
	, ft.Name  FundingType
	,ft.FundingTypeID
from [Evolution].[Crm].[ContractProduct] cp
left join Evolution.[Financial].[FundingType] ft on ft.FundingTypeID = cp.FundingTypeID
where ft.Disabled != 1
and cp.FundingTypeID <> 5 --not a tariff
and cp.RemovedDate is null
and cp.ParentContractProductID is null --most recent funding for contract
--and cp.pro
),
Bonuses as(
SELECT * FROM 
(
	select 
		cc.ContractProductID --changed this
		,case 
			when cc.CostTypeID IN (34,35,36) then  'VolumeBonus'
			else ct.Name end as BonusType
		,cc.amount
	from [Evolution].[Crm].[ContractCost] cc
	left join [Evolution].[Financial].[CostType] ct on cc.CostTypeID = ct.CostTypeID
)T
PIVOT(
	SUM(AMOUNT)
	FOR BonusType IN (
	[Advance]
	,[Revshare]
	,[VolumeBonus]
	,[Churn Bonus]
	,[Digital Bonus]
	,[CSI Bonus]
	,[Resign Bonus]
	,[Monthly Cost]
	,[Advance Recovery]
	,[Finance Deposit]
	) 
)AS PIVOT_TABLE

)
, preAgg AS (


	SELECT  
		c.ContractID
		,c.CustomerID
		,ct.Name CustomerType
		,try_cast(c.ContractNumber as BIGINT) [MPN]
		,c.SalesPersonEmployeeID
		,case when tt.ConnectionTypeID = 8 then 1 else 0 end as VoiceTarrif
		,c.DateSold
		,cd.DateCompleted
		,concat(g.Name,' - ',ps.Name) [GradeStatus]
		,e.EmployeeID
		,CONCAT(e.FirstName,' ',e.LastName) SalesPersonName
		,d.Name departmentName
		,t.RevsharePCT
		,case 
			when t.RevsharePCT = 35.00 then 'PROMO' 
			when t.RevsharePct = 48.00 then  'SIMO'
			when t.RevsharePct = 56.00 then 'Advanceable'
			else 'Unmapped'
		end as TariffGroup
		,case 
			when t.RevsharePCT = 56.00 then 1 
			else 0 
		end as isAdvanceable
		,COC.Code CostCenterCode
		,coc.Name CostCenterName
		,case 
			when COC.Code = 'NWR' then 'New World Revenue'
			when coc.code = 'RET' then 'Retentions'
			when coc.code = 'REN' then 'Renewals'
			when coc.code = 'NCN' then 'New Connections'
			when coc.code = 'REF' then 'Refresh'
			when coc.code = 'LOW' then 'Low Spend'
			when coc.code = 'BIZ' then 'Business Upgrades'
			when coc.code = 'CUS' THEN 'Customer Services'
			else 'Unmapped'
		END AS SalesTeam
		,tt.Name TariffType
		,case
			when tt.Name like '%Voice%' then 'Voice'
			when tt.Name like '%Data%' then 'Data'
			when tt.Name like '%Fixed Line Services%' then 'Fixed Line'
			when tt.Name like 'Additional' then tt.Name
			when tt.Name like 'Cloud Service' then 'Digital'
			else 'Unmapped'
		END AS TariffCategory
		,case
			when ct.Name = 'SOHO' then 'Core Mobile'
			when ct.Name = 'Mid-Market & Enterprise' then 'Midmarket'
			else 'Other'
		end as BusinessUnit
	,t.ProductID
	,t.Term ProductTerm
	,c.contractTerm
	,dl.Name DealerName
	,f.FundingType
	,B.[Advance]
	,B.[Revshare]
	,b.[Monthly Cost]
	,B.[VolumeBonus]
	,B.[Churn Bonus]
	,B.[Digital Bonus]
	,B.[CSI Bonus]
	,B.[Resign Bonus]
	,B.[Advance Recovery]
	,B.[Finance Deposit]
	,CC.RecurrenceCount

	FROM Evolution.[Crm].[Contract] c
	
	left join Evolution.crm.customer cu 
		on cu.CustomerID = c.CustomerID
	
	left join Evolution.[Crm].[CustomerType] ct 
		on ct.CustomerTypeID = cu.CustomerTypeID

	left JOIN [Evolution].[Crm].[Dealer] dl  
		ON dl.DealerID = ct.DealerID
	
	left join [Datastore].[Store].[ContractDate] cd 
		on cd.ContractID = c.ContractID
	
	left join Evolution.[HR].[Employee] e 
		on e.EmployeeID = c.SalesPersonEmployeeID
	
	left join Evolution.[HR].[Employee] am
		on AM.EmployeeID = c.SalesPersonEmployeeID
	
	left join [Evolution].[HR].[EmployeeDepartmentLink] edl 
		on edl.EmployeeID = e.EmployeeID
		and edl.StartDate <= c.DateSold
		and (edl.EndDate is null or edl.EndDate > c.DateSold) --which department was the employee in at the point of sale
	
	left join Evolution.hr.Department d 
		on edl.DepartmentID = d.DepartmentID
	
	LEFT JOIN [Evolution].[Financial].[CostCentre]	COC 
		ON	COC.CostCentreID = D.CostCentreID												
	
	left join Tariffs t 
		on t.ContractID = c.ContractID
	
	left join ContractCosts CC 
		on CC.ContractProductID = t.ContractProductID
		and CostTypeID =  9


	
	left join [Evolution].[Crm].[TariffType] tt 
		on tt.TariffTypeID = c.TariffTypeID
	
	left join [Evolution].[Crm].[ProvisioningStatus] PS
		on ps.ProvisioningStatusID = c.ProvisioningStatusID
	
	left JOIN [Evolution].[Crm].[Grade] g
		ON g.GradeID = ps.GradeID

	LEFT JOIN Funding F
		ON F.ContractID = c.ContractID
	LEFT JOIN Bonuses B
		ON B.ContractProductID = t.ContractProductID --changed this




	--where c.DateSold >=  dateadd(month,-3,getdate())
			where c.DateSold >=  '2018-01-01 00:00:00.000'

	and c.ContractID != 50452488
)
SELECT * FROM preAgg

;with finances as 
(
SELECT * FROM 
(
	select 
		cc.ContractProductID --changed this
		,cc.ContractID
		,case 
			when cc.CostTypeID IN (34,35,36) then  'VolumeBonus'
			else ct.Name end as BonusType
		,cc.amount
	from [Evolution].[Crm].[ContractCost] cc
	left join [Evolution].[Financial].[CostType] ct on cc.CostTypeID = ct.CostTypeID
	where cc.ContractProductID is null
)T
PIVOT(
	SUM(AMOUNT)
	FOR BonusType IN (
	[Customer Card Payment]
	,[Finance Deposit]
	,[Buy Out Cost]
	) 
)AS PIVOT_TABLE
), 
mostRecentDispatch AS (

SELECT
	DO.*
	,DOL.ContractProductID
	,ROW_NUMBER()over(partition by DOL.contractproductid order by DO.DateLastUpdated desc) rn
	,do.DateCreated DispatchCreated
FROM product.DispatchOrder DO
left join product.DispatchOrderLine dol on do.DispatchOrderID  =dol.DispatchOrderID
left join [Product].[DispatchStatus] ds on ds.DispatchStatusID = do.DispatchStatusID
--WHERE DO.DispatchStatusID <> 7
where ContractProductID is not null
)

,pre as (
	SELECT
		cp.ContractID
		,cp.ContractProductID
		,cp.AddedDate
		,pr.ProductID
		,pr.Name ProductName
		,gr.ProductTypeID
		,PT.Name ProductType 
		,gr.Name ProductGroup
		,f.[Customer Card Payment] as CustomerCardPayment
		,f.[Finance Deposit] as FinanceDeposit
		,f.[Buy Out Cost] as BuyOutCost
		,ds.Status as DispatchStatus
		,ds.DispatchCreated
	FROM [Evolution].[Crm].[ContractProduct] cp 
	left JOIN [Evolution].[Product].[DistributorProduct] dp  ON dp.DistributorProductID = cp.DistributorProductID
	left JOIN [Evolution].[Product].[Product] pr  ON pr.ProductID = dp.ProductID
	left JOIN [Evolution].[Product].[Group] gr  ON gr.GroupID = pr.GroupID 
												--AND gr.ProductTypeID = 2
	inner join Evolution.[Product].[Type] pt ON PT.TypeID = GR.ProductTypeID
	left join finances f on f.ContractID = cp.ContractID
	left join mostRecentDispatch ds on ds.ContractProductID = cp.ContractProductID
									and ds.rn = 1
	where cp.RemovedDate is null
	--and cp.ContractID = 50437758
	and cp.addedDate >= '2018-01-01 00:00:00.000'


	) 
	--select ContractID, ContractProductID, count(*) from pre
	--where producttypeid = 2 
	--group by ContractID, ContractProductID
	--having count(*) > 1
	select * from pre
